src:
Zgodbe s kraške gmajne in borjačev v knjižici
04 Nov 2019, 10:57 by Olga Knez

Društvo Univerza za tretje življenjsko obdobje Kras je za zaključek 4. Festivala Kraška gmajna, ki je poudaril dediščino krajine, v Bunčetovi domačiji predstavilo knjižico Z velikim srcem - pripovedi s kraških borjačev in gmajn.



Foto: Olga Knez

DUTOVLJE > Uredila jo je Nadja Mislej Božič, slikovni del Ana Hrast, dogodivščine iz otroštva pa so prispevali še Jasna Čuk Rupnik, Olga Knez, Nada Lozej, Mirjana Stopar, Sonja Nardelli, Jolka Milič in Viktor Saksida.
text:
Stories from the Karst Thunder and Fighters in the Booklet
04 Nov 2019, 10:57 by Olga Knez

The University for the Third Age of the Karst presented a book With a Big Heart - tales from Karst fighters and gmines at the Bunčet Homestead, at the conclusion of the 4th Kraš gmajna Festival, which emphasized the heritage of the landscape.



Photo by Olga Knez

DUTOVLJE> Edited by Nadja Mislej Božič, pictorial work by Ana Hrast, and adventures from childhood were contributed by Jasna Čuk Rupnik, Olga Knez, Nada Lozej, Mirjana Stopar, Sonja Nardelli, Jolka Milič and Viktor Saksida.
